features: [360-degree Revolving Design]: This rotating pencil holder can be turned up to 360-degree rotation to the left and right, it spins smoothly all around without getting stuck. Easy to access, easy to get from any angle, allows you to keep all of your things within reach, keeps your stationery supplies organized and easy to find, and enables you to improve your working efficiency.

[5 Independent Compartments Design]: This desktop pencil organizer is divided into 5 compartments to meet your various needs, this pencil holder is not only a stationary for organizing your office accessories, such as pen, pencil, marker, highlighters, rulers, scissors, letter openers, and many other desk widgets but also can be a makeup brush holder cup to store the makeup brushes, lip/eye liners, glosses, blushes, hair accessories, nail polish, jewelry, and more. Give you an uncluttered space.

[Multipurpose Desk Organizer]: This desktop organizer is great for any space, such as an office, home, bathroom, living room, bedroom, vanity, dresser, worktop, and countertop used to store office, stationery, makeup, bathroom accessories, and worktop tools.

[Modern Aesthetic Design]: A classic style gives this spinning organizer a versatile look, and striped has a sleek sophisticated design that will give your office or home décor such a classy touch. High-quality ABS makes it durable and long-lasting, while a warm cute color adds a touch of charm.

[Safe Shopping]: This desk pencil holder is the perfect gift for yourself, a friend, a college student, someone at the office, or that special person in your life. Hope you have a good shopping. If there is any problem with the product, please contact us by email immediately, and we will solve the problem as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Desk Organizer for Stylish Productivity
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Desk Pencil Pen Holder in blue, and I must say, it has drastically improved the organization of my desk and enhanced my productivity. This sleek and eye-catching organizer not only serves its purpose but also adds a touch of elegance to my workspace.First and foremost, the 360° degree rotating feature of this holder is a game-changer. With its smooth rotation, all of my pens, pencils, and other stationery supplies are easily accessible without any hassle. I love being able to spin it around and effortlessly select the exact writing instrument or tool I need, saving me valuable time during my busy work or study sessions.The five slots provided in this holder offer ample storage space for my various writing tools. The size of each slot is perfect, ensuring that my pens and pencils fit snugly, preventing them from sliding around or getting lost. The depth of the slots is also ideal for holding items like highlighters, markers, or even small scissors, making it a versatile organizer for all my stationery needs.The build quality of this pencil pen holder is impressive. It is made of sturdy and durable materials, ensuring that it will last for an extended period of time. The smooth edges and solid construction provide a premium feel, making it a reliable companion for years to come. The vibrant blue color adds a refreshing accent to my desk, adding a pop of color to my workspace and making it aesthetically pleasing.Aside from its practicality, the cute and compact design of this organizer is a bonus. It occupies minimal space on my desk, allowing me to keep my workspace neat and tidy. The sleek design seamlessly blends with any office or home decor, adding a touch of sophistication to my surroundings.Furthermore, this pencil pen holder isn't limited to just office use. It is equally suitable for school, art supplies, or even at home. Its versatility makes it a useful accessory in various settings, ensuring that it serves its purpose beyond the workplace.In conclusion, the Desk Pencil Pen Holder is a must-have for anyone seeking organization and style in their workspace. With its 360° degree rotating feature, generous slot capacity, and durable construction, it checks all the boxes for a perfect desk organizer. Say goodbye to cluttered surfaces and hello to a productive and elegant workspace with this charming organizer. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a practical and attractive stationery storage solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Visually Pleasing & Convenient
reviews.reviewText: I think this pencil holder is wonderful. I love that I can separate different brands/types of pens and markers from each other keeping everything looking clean and organized. I just really love how it looks, it makes it inviting to grab a writing utensil if that makes any sense. It is a good size, I’m able to fit plenty of items in it. The white finish with the little gold feet are stylish. I love how it rotates too so you can easily browse all the options in the holder. It is plastic, not necessarily the best material, but that doesn’t bother me. I bought this for my office and ended up buying another for my home. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unlike other spinners, this one actually works! Great quality, beautiful color and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No More Misplaced Pens!
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I don't like about this pen organizer is now I don't have an excuse to buy more pens! No more scattered pens across my desk or searching for that favorite pen hidden at the back of a drawer somewhere. This little organizer isn't only cute, but functional and has helped me clear up some clutter from my desk. It rotates fairly smoothly allowing ease of access to all the compartments, and for something that doesn't take up too much space, I'm surprised by how much it can hold! I was easily able to fit a couple dozen pens and highlights in, as well as full sized scissors, envelope opener, staple remover, tape, and more! Going to buy another one for my makeup brushes next!

reviews.reviewText: I adore this rotating organizer!! The color is beautiful, the spin is smooth and quiet, and the divided compartments make it so easy to separate all my journaling pens and markers!! High quality for a great price!

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn’t look as good in real life
reviews.reviewText: This product does exactly what it’s supposed to, but I was a little disappointed at how plastic and cheap it looks in person.
